title: Spiritual Healing with Aromatherapy Diffusers | BioEnergy Aromatherapy
description: Fill your room or sacred space with the aromas of these powerful botanical energy blends to help shift your current energetic frequency to one that feels better. Made with the finest quality pure, natural, wildcrafted, and certified organic essential oils from across the globe.
cleaned_text: Spiritual Healing Diffusers Fill your room or sacred space with the aromas of these powerful botanical energy blends to help shift your current energetic frequency to one that feels better. Made with the finest quality pure, natural, wildcrafted, and certified organic essential oils from across the globe for natural air care. Advantages of a Reed Diffuser by Dorian Lynn: - Requires no electricity to operate for energy efficiency - Freedom to place it anywhere without an outlet - Continuous and steady stream of aroma without fussing with switches - Virtually no maintenance and nothing to clean - Distributes undiluted essential oil blends into your home without water - Made with glass and not plastic Formulated with Dorian Lynn's exclusive Targeted Cell Signaling - Targets breakdowns in cell communication in 10 body systems and their corresponding endocrine glands using our exclusive Targeted Cell Signaling - Therapeutic blends of 100% pure, organic, and precious essential oils -
